bio: Airdrop Farmer, Crypto Native , Indie Developer
contributionDescription: Liquildless has solved a pressing DeFi issue by providing real-time health factor notifications, safeguarding users on Optimism from liquidation in Aave, Compound, and Radiant. Our tool serves all Optimism users, enhancing safety and asset protection without making future promises.
impactDescription:
Liquildless has emerged as a pioneering solution on Optimism and Base by addressing a critical performance gap. Notably, Aave, a prominent lending protocol, lacked any notification service on these platforms.

 In stark contrast, Liquildless has stepped in to provide a vital service that empowers users with real-time notifications. While our project is in its early stages, we've already set the groundwork to fill this essential void, ensuring Aave users and the broader DeFi community can access crucial notifications to safeguard their assets effectively.

impactMetrics.description: Add heath factor notification on OP Aave
Add heath factor notification Base Aave

pwRecategorizeReason: NO, the application is incorrectly categorized because despite being listed as an "INDIVIDUAL", the application talks about a project "Liquildless" providing a solution, which aligns more with a "PROJECT" designation.
